name: Tracle Improvement
description: Tracle has improved with a new font, buttons, and search box. Before using this skin, please note that you need to download a specific font for text to appear as intended. If you're on a Chromebook, or are unable to install this font, some text will appear using the default font of Arial. You can install these fonts on Mac and Windows. 1. Click here to download "Albert Sans" from Google Fonts. 2. Right-click on the downloaded zip file, and select "Extract all". 3. Press Ctrl+A to highlight all the fonts. Right-click, and select install. 4. Restart your computer.
